_metadata.title: Retention Policy - Regulatory Hold for Financial Services
_metadata.description: Immutable retention policy for financial services organisations to comply with SEC Rule 17a-4, FINRA 4511, and MiFID II record-keeping requirements. Applies Preservation Lock to prevent any modification or deletion of the retention policy, ensuring regulatory compliance for broker-dealer and investment advisor records.

prerequisites: Connect to Security & Compliance PowerShell: Connect-IPPSSession
Legal review of regulatory requirements (SEC 17a-4, FINRA 4511) completed
Confirm 7-year retention requirement with legal counsel before applying Preservation Lock
CRITICAL: Preservation Lock is IRREVERSIBLE - policy cannot be modified, disabled, or deleted once locked
Test retention policy without RestrictiveRetention first to validate scope

regulatoryContext.sec17a4: SEC Rule 17a-4(f): Electronic storage media must preserve records in non-rewriteable, non-erasable format (WORM)
regulatoryContext.finra4511: FINRA Rule 4511: Books and records must be preserved for at least 6 years
regulatoryContext.mifidII: MiFID II Article 16: Investment firms must keep records for a minimum of 5 years
regulatoryContext.dodd_frank: Dodd-Frank Act: Swap dealers must retain records for 5 years

deploymentSteps: 2. Obtain written legal approval for immutable retention policy
3. Create the retention policy WITHOUT Preservation Lock first
4. Create the retention rule with 7-year duration
5. Validate policy scope and verify correct workloads are targeted
6. Apply Preservation Lock (RestrictiveRetention) - THIS IS IRREVERSIBLE
7. Document the locked policy for audit evidence
_notes.rollbackProcedure: NONE. Preservation Lock is irreversible. Once RestrictiveRetention is set to $true, the policy cannot be modified, disabled, or deleted. This is by design to meet SEC 17a-4 WORM requirements. Plan carefully before enabling.

parameters.Name: PV23-Retention-RegulatoryHold-Financial
parameters.Comment: Immutable retention policy for financial services regulatory compliance (SEC 17a-4, FINRA 4511). Preservation Lock applied - IRREVERSIBLE.

applyPreservationLock._warning: IRREVERSIBLE: Once RestrictiveRetention is set to $true, the policy is locked permanently. The retention period can only be extended, never shortened. The policy cannot be disabled or deleted.
